overview:
Adam is a NY based business builder with a number of successful initiatives under his fourth degree black belt.

Adam is a business owner and entrepreneur from New York with an exciting history of success. He is a professional martial artist, keynote speaker, business consultant and family man with a passion for building disruptive technology in the mobile application space.

Presently, Adam is overseeing the evolution of zoomzin mobile technology as the CEO of their parent start up company Limco Development, Inc.
